name: Lilinia's World (Demo)
description:
*** IMPORTANT *** PLEASE RUN THIS PAGE IN EITHER GOOGLE CHROME, MICROSOFT EDGE OR MOZILLA FIREFOX BROWSER TO PLAY  (SAFARI IS KNOWN TO HAVE AUDIO PLAYBACK ISSUES)

Play the demo to Lilinia's World, the brand new 'retro' JRPG adventure created in RPG Maker! 

I am a music composer and have created this project to showcase my music composition abilities for video-games.

The full soundtrack can be listened to here: https://soundcloud.com/invisibleforest/sets/lilinias_world_ost/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Synopsis:

It is a time of prosperity for the land of Chimera. The earth is bountiful as its people reap the fruits of their labour.

However, amidst this era of peace and comfort, many do not stray from the simple life, content to see out their days beside a warm hearth. 

Deep in the forest, in the little town of Oakewood, there lives Lilinia, a restless dreamer who longs for something more...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Demo Features:

  • Casual gameplay for players of all ages to enjoy
  • Narrative-driven adventure with multiple-choice conversation branches
  • Quirky characters
  • Turn-based battle system akin to old style Final Fantasy games
  • Original 15- track OST composed by Invisible Forest
